column4: Can someone help me fix my ubuntu install,  think kdm got messed up somehow and i dont know how to either switch to gdm or to re-install kdm
When i log into xserver using kdm, for some reason it starts to log in and then stops and brings up kdm again. Can someone help me fix this
have you checked to see what type of seesion you have selected?
i have tried all the different sessions and nothing works
